email.subject: {course_name} certificate creation notification.
email.body:
Hey, {name},

This is {company_name}. We are contacting you to let you know your certificate for {course_name} has been created. Attached is a copy of your certificate. Please feel free to reach out if you have any questions.

Respectfully,

{company_name}

P: {company_phone}

E: {company_email}
